Reuters updated 1/21/2011 7:49:28 AM ET 2011-01-21T12:49:28 Share Print Font:+- LONDON- The British prime minister's communications chief Andy Coulson resigned on Friday as prosecutors stepped up their inquiries into illegal phone hacking at a tabloid newspaper when he was editor. "We confirm that Andy Coulson has resigned, an official in Prime Minister David Cameron 's office said. Andy Coulson was a key part of David Cameron 's inner circle after joining the Conservative leader's team when in opposition in 2007. David Cameron had said Monday that

A statement from David Cameron read: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. " Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. Andy Coulson 's position had appeared tenuous for several months as the row over phone hacking at the News of the World intensified. Oregon, told the Washington Post that the timing of Gabrielle Giffords opening her eyes was a good sign and sees a positive prognosis for the Congresswoman. "It's very significant," told the Post. In someone like her, who in just a few days after injury is opening her eyes and following commands, it is a much better prognostic indicator of recovery. It's less meaningful when it happens three or six months later.
